lead_paragraph: Four American service members were killed by a roadside bomb in eastern Afghanistan on Tuesday, according to the NATO-led International Security Assistance Force.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

snippet: Four American service members were killed by a roadside bomb in eastern Afghanistan on Tuesday, according to the NATO-led International Security Assistance Force.

headline.main: Attacks on U.S. Soldiers in Afghanistan Intensify

byline.contributor: Richard Berry contributed reporting from Paris, and an Afghan employee of The New York Times from Nangarhar Province.
